targets.queryText: WITH ret AS (SELECT contribution_pct FROM daily_return_attribution WHERE as_of_date_local = (SELECT MAX(as_of_date_local) FROM daily_return_attribution) AND window = '1m' LIMIT 1), mv AS (SELECT market_value FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT (mv.market_value * ret.contribution_pct / 100.0) AS value FROM mv, ret;
targets.rawQueryText: WITH ret AS (SELECT contribution_pct FROM daily_return_attribution WHERE as_of_date_local = (SELECT MAX(as_of_date_local) FROM daily_return_attribution) AND window = '1m' LIMIT 1), mv AS (SELECT market_value FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT (mv.market_value * ret.contribution_pct / 100.0) AS value FROM mv, ret;

targets.queryText: SELECT dividends_received_period AS value FROM period_summary WHERE period_type='MONTH' AND is_rolling=1 ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT dividends_received_period AS value FROM period_summary WHERE period_type='MONTH' AND is_rolling=1 ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: WITH total AS (WITH ret AS (SELECT contribution_pct FROM daily_return_attribution WHERE as_of_date_local = (SELECT MAX(as_of_date_local) FROM daily_return_attribution) AND window = '1m' LIMIT 1), mv AS (SELECT market_value FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT (mv.market_value * ret.contribution_pct / 100.0) AS total_return FROM mv, ret), income AS (SELECT dividends_received_period AS income_return FROM period_summary WHERE period_type='MONTH' AND is_rolling=1 ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT (total.total_return - COALESCE(income.income_return, 0)) AS value FROM total, income;
targets.rawQueryText: WITH total AS (WITH ret AS (SELECT contribution_pct FROM daily_return_attribution WHERE as_of_date_local = (SELECT MAX(as_of_date_local) FROM daily_return_attribution) AND window = '1m' LIMIT 1), mv AS (SELECT market_value FROM daily_portfolio ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT (mv.market_value * ret.contribution_pct / 100.0) AS total_return FROM mv, ret), income AS (SELECT dividends_received_period AS income_return FROM period_summary WHERE period_type='MONTH' AND is_rolling=1 ORDER BY period_end_date DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT (total.total_return - COALESCE(income.income_return, 0)) AS value FROM total, income;

targets.queryText: SELECT contribution_pct AS value FROM daily_return_attribution WHERE as_of_date_local = (SELECT MAX(as_of_date_local) FROM daily_return_attribution) AND window = '1m' LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT contribution_pct AS value FROM daily_return_attribution WHERE as_of_date_local = (SELECT MAX(as_of_date_local) FROM daily_return_attribution) AND window = '1m' LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT symbol, ROUND(market_value * twr_1m_pct / 100.0, 2) AS contribution_dollars, twr_1m_pct AS contribution_pct, (projected_monthly_dividend / NULLIF(market_value, 0) * 100.0) AS income_pct, (twr_1m_pct - (projected_monthly_dividend / NULLIF(market_value, 0) * 100.0)) AS price_pct FROM daily_holdings WHERE as_of_date_local = (SELECT MAX(as_of_date_local) FROM daily_holdings) ORDER BY contribution_dollars DESC LIMIT 5;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT symbol, ROUND(market_value * twr_1m_pct / 100.0, 2) AS contribution_dollars, twr_1m_pct AS contribution_pct, (projected_monthly_dividend / NULLIF(market_value, 0) * 100.0) AS income_pct, (twr_1m_pct - (projected_monthly_dividend / NULLIF(market_value, 0) * 100.0)) AS price_pct FROM daily_holdings WHERE as_of_date_local = (SELECT MAX(as_of_date_local) FROM daily_holdings) ORDER BY contribution_dollars DESC LIMIT 5;

targets.queryText: SELECT symbol, ROUND(market_value * twr_1m_pct / 100.0, 2) AS contribution_dollars, twr_1m_pct AS contribution_pct, (projected_monthly_dividend / NULLIF(market_value, 0) * 100.0) AS income_pct, (twr_1m_pct - (projected_monthly_dividend / NULLIF(market_value, 0) * 100.0)) AS price_pct FROM daily_holdings WHERE as_of_date_local = (SELECT MAX(as_of_date_local) FROM daily_holdings) ORDER BY contribution_dollars ASC LIMIT 5;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT symbol, ROUND(market_value * twr_1m_pct / 100.0, 2) AS contribution_dollars, twr_1m_pct AS contribution_pct, (projected_monthly_dividend / NULLIF(market_value, 0) * 100.0) AS income_pct, (twr_1m_pct - (projected_monthly_dividend / NULLIF(market_value, 0) * 100.0)) AS price_pct FROM daily_holdings WHERE as_of_date_local = (SELECT MAX(as_of_date_local) FROM daily_holdings) ORDER BY contribution_dollars ASC LIMIT 5;
